p: The variation in the marketability of wild edible plants may be due to differences in geographical location, types of wild edible plants, and culture of the society. The list of the most commonly marketed wild edible plants are indicated in Table 4. This review indicates that some wild edible plants ( Tamarindus indica, Ximenia americana, and Moringa stenopetala) are marketed in different parts of the country. Besides their food security value, WEPs are sold in the market to generate income.
